- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Joan, Just sent it over - thanks! Can you provide me with your correct address? I will make sure it is updated in our system. Thanks again,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: joantrant@gmail.com [mailto:joantrant@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2012 12:31 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Enrolled...finally Hi, Sara.
I completed my enrollment form (except the system wouldn't allow me to correct my address).
Pls review it and contact me with any questions. You can email or call me on M/ 917-763-6361.
If all is in order, pls contact Sebastian von Stauffenberg, CEO of MicroRate, and copy his budget/finance mgr, Katherine, at the following addresses: Sebastian@MicroRate.com <mailto:Sebastian@MicroRate.com> Katherine@MicroRate.com <mailto:Katherine@MicroRate.com>
Their phone no is 703-243-5340.
I am meeting with them tomorrow. No worries I'd you can't, but if toy van send your client orientation package to them today, that would be great.
Thanks!
Joan
Sent from my Verizon Wireless Phone</html
